name: OCKStackView
desc: A stack view that supports animating the showing and hiding of arranged subviews, and optionally creating separators dynamically.

items.name: init(style: OCKStackView.Style)
items.desc: Creates a stack view with a style.

items.name: var arrangedSubviews: [UIView]
items.desc: An ordered array of the subviews.

items.name: var showsOuterSeparators: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines if the top and bottom separators are shown when the stack view has a separated style.

items.name: let style: OCKStackView.Style
items.desc: The style of the stack view.

items.name: var customStyle: OCKStyler?
items.desc: An object that contains constants for styling the view.

items.name: enum OCKStackView.Style
items.desc: The styles that determine the appearnce of children in the stack view.

items.name: func addArrangedSubview(UIView)
items.desc: Adds a subview to the end of the stack view.

items.name: func addArrangedSubview(UIView, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Adds a subview to the end of the stack view, with an option to animate the change.

items.name: func insertArrangedSubview(UIView, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts an arranged subview at a specific index in the stack view.

items.name: func insertArrangedSubview(UIView, at: Int, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Inserts an arranged subview at a specific index in the stack view, with an option to animate the change.

items.name: func removeArrangedSubview(UIView)
items.desc: Removes an arranged subview from the stack view.

items.name: func removeArrangedSubview(UIView, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Removes an arranged subview from the stack view, with an option to animate the change.

items.name: func clear(animated: Bool)
items.desc: Clears the views in the stack view.
